name: Sword of Pator
description:
Only recently created by act of Sanmatar Shakor, the Sword of Pator is the highest honor that can be awarded capsuleers for service to the Republic. At least four of the seven tribes must be in agreement before it can be awarded, making its conferment a rare and auspicious occasion.

“Tribe, clan, and family. Together, they are our home. And when they are taken, we will stop at nothing to reclaim them.” - Excerpt from Starkmanir Oral History
